name: George

topics.response_text: Whoa there, pal. You better slow down, or you'll get blown up like the rest of the idiots who thought they'd scavenge in Boomer territory.

topics.topic_text: Thanks for the warning. What's going on past those signs?
topics.response_text: Oh lordy lordy, you haven't heard of the Boomers? What rock have you been living under?

topics.topic_text: 300 caps? Nah, I've got better things to spend my caps on.
topics.response_text: Suit yourself. Come back and see me when you get tired of picking shrapnel out of your backside.

topics.topic_text: Is there a way to get past?
topics.response_text: There is a way, and I'll tell you... for a little wager?
Well, I know the secret to get past. If you give me the caps, I'll tell you.

topics.topic_text: <Pay 300 caps> You've got yourself a bet.
topics.response_text: Okay, here you go. That page has the details, but it's all in the timing as you move from building to building.

topics.topic_text: 300 caps? I'm a bit short right now. How about 200?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Alright, I suppose I can cut you a deal, but not a cap lower. I gotta make a living here.

topics.topic_text: You can tell me, or you can tell the underside of my boot.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Whoa, simmer down. I'll tell you. I'm a gambler and a scavenger.

topics.topic_text: I believe you said you would double my money.

topics.response_text: Sorry about that, poor memory. Here you go.

topics.topic_text: <Lie> Make it 700 caps or I'll tell the Boomers to adjust their trajectory.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You drive a hard bargain. Here you go. Have a nice{sarcasm on nice}day.

topics.topic_text: Yep, thanks for the compliment. Bye!

description:
George is a 65 year-old African American Male.

George is a weathered scavenger and gambler who operates near Nellis Air Force Base in the Mojave Wasteland. His income comes from two sources: placing high-stakes bets with travelers who dare to venture near the military base, and 'reclaiming' abandoned or forgotten goods from the dangerous surrounding areas. George is notorious for his double-or-nothing wagers where he bets that travelers cannot reach Nellis's gate and return alive.

George's Personality: George is cunning, opportunistic, and pragmatically amoral. He possesses a natural talent for reading people and exploiting their desperation. Despite his morally questionable profession, George maintains a strict code when it comes to his bets - he always honors his agreements and pays his debts promptly. He's charismatic enough to lure people into his wagers but not above using intimidation tactics when necessary.

George's Backstory: Before the Great War, George was a successful entrepreneur who lost everything when civilization collapsed. Forced to adapt to the wasteland's harsh realities, he developed skills in gambling and navigation, eventually focusing on the dangerous areas around Nellis Air Base. Over the decades, he's built a reputation as both a fearless scavenger and a cunning gambler. George has been operating in this region for over 30 years, establishing his small shack as a known, albeit risky, meeting point for travelers and fortune seekers.
